title: Niagara Falls in Winter
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on gray buff paper.
description: Horizontal view of Niagara river rushing downstream and Falls cascading into pool in right foreground; a snow-covered bank, in left foreground, contains three straggly, bare trees with a more heavily forested bank on farshore. Horseshoe falls at right distance under bleak wintry sky filled with several thick clouds.
name: Drawing
